q: '' he said. Sergio Marchionne : We're going to reinvent the minivan He wanted to allay fears among Windsor's 4,300 workers that such a change will jeopardize their jobs. We're not going to give an inch of territory in terms of our domination of the segment, Sergio Marchionne said.`` But we need to completely rethink the minivan. We need to make it a lot more versatile than it is. The architecture will allow us to make a minivan-like vehicle plus others.''

whatever. We're not gon na send a manned Mars probe until 2040-ish, so, you know.'' Leonard Nimoy , Simon Cowell Leonard Nimoy in The Original Series, and producer/director of this new series said: Well, really? We did what... launch a man on the moon in' 69. What have we done since? NOTHING. Sure, we built the ISS, that was pretty impressive. But seriously? If we had invested in getting man onto the moon for an extended period or getting him to Mars, maybe all the minds and genius that had gone into creating bigger and better weapons could be used to create bigger and better spacecraft for humanity. So, in essence. Screw you. The show, to avoid being chased by NASA people, will be filmed in Britain, as thier Space Agency isn't too fussed about a TV show about space when the X-Factor is on.
